param.caption: Max RAM allocated
param.desc: Maximum usable memory in MB. Anything beyond 3840MB will result in server crashing.

param.caption: Server Password
param.desc: Password for server access. If left empty no password will be required to join the server. !!NOT ADMIN PASSWORD!!

param.caption: May improve performance
param.desc: Be aware this means no errors are saved to RPT file (report log). Yet in case of crash the fault address block info is saved.

param.caption: Automatically initialize mission just like first client does.
param.desc: Note: Server config file (server.cfg) must contain "Persistent=1;", if it's 0 autoInit skips. Warning: This will break the Arma_3_Mission_Parameters function, so do not use it when you work with mission parameters, only default values are returned!
